type.description: Storage backend. The manifest should contain backend-specific parameters

container_path.description: Path identifying the container this storage is for (by convention, /.uuid/...)

trusted.description: Allow loading unsigned manifests (for the same signer) from this storage

manifest_path.description: A strategy for finding manifests in this storage, based on path.

path.description: A path that can contain '*' and '{path}'. Default is '{path}.yaml'.
